InputFood Statistics PUSH-UP\n1)Lie face down on the floor with hands slightly wider than shoulder width.\n\n2)Push down on the floor with the hands and raise the body up by extending the arms.\n\n3)Lower the body back down to the floor by bending at the arms and repeat.\nNotes:\n Maintain a straight body throughout the exercise. SIT-UP\n1)Lift your upper body from the floor and up toward the thighs, exhaling as your rise.\n\n2)Contract the abs hard and hold the position for a second.\n\n3) Lower the body back down to the starting position. SQUAT\n1)Set your feet shoulder-width apart, toes slightly turned out. Pull in your lower abs, and keep your eyes forward.\n\n2)Slowly bend at the knees and drop your hips to lower your body. Keep your heels flat on the floor.\n\n3) At the bottom of the exercise pause for a moment and strongly push back up to the starting position, mirroring the descent.
